channel.title: SevenAtSevenSportsAndEntertainment
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenSportsAndEntertainment, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: New NWSL Team in Boston to Be Known As ‘BOS Nation FC’
item.description: Massachusetts-based team will become 15th franchise in National Women's Soccer League when it takes to the pitch for the 2026 season
